alert.note: Alert for Caroline; Queen Anne's (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 1:57AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Kent, east central Queen Anne`s and northeastern Caroline Counties through 230 AM EDT... At 157 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Carville, or over Centerville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Centerville, Centreville, Greensboro, Oakland, Church Hill, Goldsboro, Hartly, Starr, Hazlettville, Starkey Corner, Sandtown, Carville, Hope, Felton, Henderson, Marydel, Templeville and Barclay. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
